definition: To effervesce or bubble up, often used to describe the action of a liquid or gas rapidly producing small bubbles or fizzing. It is commonly used to refer to the sound or action of carbonated beverages when opened or poured.

examples.german: Das Wasser sprudelt aus der Quelle.
examples.english: The water bubbles out of the spring.
The soda fizzes in the glass.
